item.title: Register your functions using decorators
item.description:
Using decorators to register functions¶


In this article we will explore the use of decorators to improve code for a very common situation: listing functions to be run on an object.

You have probably gone through this before: you have a bunch of functions and an object, and you need to specify a subset of those functions to be run on that particular object.
